biocontainers.name: dligand2
biocontainers.summary: DLIGAND2: an improved knowledge-based energy function for protein-ligand interactions using the distance-scaled, finite, ideal-gas reference state.

biotools.summary: An improved knowledge-based energy function for protein-ligand interactions using the distance-scaled, finite, ideal-gas reference state | DLIGAND2 is a knowledge-based method to predict protein-ligand binding affinity based on a distance-scaled, finite, ideal-gas reference (DFIRE) state

bioschemas.name: DLIGAND2
bioschemas.summary: An improved knowledge-based energy function for protein-ligand interactions using the distance-scaled, finite, ideal-gas reference state | DLIGAND2 is a knowledge-based method to predict protein-ligand binding affinity based on a distance-scaled, finite, ideal-gas reference (DFIRE) state
